main event: A witness observed a bright red light moving southeast, which then reversed direction and proceeded northwest before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,The object was described as conforming to standard aircraft lighting despite no sound being heard,The witness is reported to have excellent knowledge of aircraft and related phenomena,The strong wind at the 1000 FT level may have affected sound detection,The initial description of the object as oval was later updated in the personal interview.
sighted object: a bright red light in the sky
witness description: The witness is a civilian with a fair background in science and excellent knowledge of helicopters, weather balloons, and aircraft.
